projects.name: Mini Music Synthesizer
projects.description: Develops pleasant music implemented by the Karplus-Strong plucked string algorithm simulating the sounds of a musical instrument

projects.name: Image-Compressor
projects.description: Simple, elegant, and powerful image compressor which works with black and white images of type pgm

projects.name: Mock Unix Shell
projects.description: Offers a variety of different commands such as mkdir, cp, get, and many more. Incorporates a file system to store all the information

projects.name: Snakes and Ladders
projects.description: Highly interactive and fun snakes and ladder's game. Winner is displayed on the board along with a pattern of flashing led lights

projects.name: 3D Solar System
projects.description: Educational software providing information on each of the objects in our solar system such as mass, size, and distance from the Sun, and more

projects.name: Mouse vs Cats
projects.description: Mouse must get all the pieces of cheese without being caught by the cats within a maze. The smarter the cat, the harder to get the cheese

projects.name: Dragger.js
projects.description: A drag and drop library that alleviates the stress of having to do DOM manipulation with smooth animations

projects.name: FanCrowd
projects.description: Designed for people who have strong interests in various topics related to entertainment such as movies, shows, sports, games, etc.

projects.name: Scikit Contributions
projects.description: Multiple contributions to scikit-learn with small, easy fixes to larger, more complex fixes with detailed documentation
